Description: Protome from a glazed composition rhyton: with traces of green glaze, in the form of an ox-head.
Findspot: Found/Acquired: Tell el-Yahudiya (said to be from)
Curator's comments: To be included in the 'Musee achemenide virtuel et interactif' (see www.achemenet.com). Published : J. Curtis, N. Tallis (eds.), Forgotten Empire, BMP, 2005, p. 123, No 122.
Bibliographic references: Curtis & Tallis 2005 / Forgotten Empire: The world of Ancient Persia (cat. 122, p.123)
Exhibition history: Exhibited: 2005-2006 Sept-Jan, London, BM, 'Forgotten Empire' 2006 7 Mar-11 Jun, Barcelona, Fundacion La Caixa, 'L'imperi Oblidat'
Acquisition name: Purchased from: Rev Greville John Chester
